event.title: Mali Job Manager Cycles

event.description: Number of cycles the GPU had a pending interrupt

event.title: Mali Arithmetic Pipe
event.name: A instructions
event.description: Number of instructions completed by the the A-pipe (normalized per pipeline)

event.name: LS instructions
event.description: Number of instructions completed by the LS-pipe

event.name: LS instruction issues
event.description: Number of instructions issued to the LS-pipe, including restarts

event.name: T instructions
event.description: Number of instructions completed by the T-pipe

event.name: T instruction issues
event.description: Number of instructions issused to the T-pipe, including restarts

event.title: Mali Texture Pipe
event.name: Cache misses
event.description: Number of instructions in the T-pipe, recirculated due to cache miss

event.name: External write beats
event.description: Number of external bus write beats

event.name: External bus stalls (W)
event.description: Number of cycles a valid write data (W channel) is stalled by the external interconnect

event.title: Mali L2 Cache Ext Reads
event.name: External read beats
event.description: Number of external bus read beats

event.title: Mali L2 Cache Ext Reads
event.name: External bus stalls (AR)
event.description: Number of cycles a valid read address (AR) is stalled by the external interconnect

event.description: Number of read transaction snoops

event.description: Number of reads hitting in the L2 cache
